flawed_nl_solution:
Maria has $120 and received $250 from her mother. So she has 120 + 250 = $<<120+250=307>>307.
As the price of the bike stands at $600, Maria needs 600 – 307 = $<<600-307=293>>293 more to buy the bike.
#### 293

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 370, not 307. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
